MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the ML1 postcode area of Motherwell. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11.45am to safely repair faulty electrical equipment located in Whamond Tower and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12.45pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.42am on the 24th of February 2021.
